amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part D of House Report 117-137 to direct the Comptroller General to conduct a study on what is known about the racial disparities that exist with respect to access to pumping breastmilk in the workplace and submit to Congress a report on the results of such study containing such recommendations as the Comptroller General determines appropriate to address those disparities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Strickland amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Strickland.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Strickland amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Strickland amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
